data.enText: the act or process of getting ready for sth or making sth ready

data.chText: 聚会的准备工作很早就开始了。
data.enText: Preparation for the party started early.

data.chText: 认真准备考试十分必要。
data.enText: Careful preparation for the exam is essential.

data.chText: 丛书的第三册现在正准备出版。
data.enText: The third book in the series is currently in preparation .

data.chText: 为备战这场重要比赛，队伍一直在严格训练。
data.enText: The team has been training hard in preparation for the big game.
things that you do to get ready for sth or make sth ready

data.chText: 这个国家正在进行备战。
data.enText: The country is making preparations for war.

data.chText: 我们已准备好要搬到新办公室。
data.enText: We made preparations to move to new offices.

data.chText: 上大学是否为你的事业打下了良好基础？
data.enText: Was going to college a good preparation for your career?
a substance that has been specially prepared for use as a medicine, cosmetic , etc.
preparations for the hair and skin

simple_means.memory_skill: prepare 准备 + ation 行为 → 准备

tr: the act of preparing something (as food) by the application of heat
example: cooking can be a great art
people are needed who have experience in cookery
he left the preparation of meals to his wife

tr: preparatory school work done outside school (especially at home)
the activity of putting or setting in order in advance of some act or purpose
example: preparations for the ceremony had begun

tr: the cognitive process of thinking about what you will do in the event of something happening
example: his planning for retirement was hindered by several uncertainties

tr: (music) a note that produces a dissonant chord is first heard in a consonant chord
example: the resolution of one dissonance is often the preparation for another dissonance

tr: the state of having been made ready or prepared for use or action (especially military action)
example: their preparation was more than adequate

tr: a substance prepared according to a formula
example: the physician prescribed a commercial preparation of the medicine

value.def: Preparation is the process of getting something ready for use or for a particular purpose or making arrangements for something.

example.ex: Rub the surface of the wood in preparation for the varnish...
example.tran: 打磨木头的表面，为刷清漆做准备。

example.ex: Few things distracted the Pastor from the preparation of his weekly sermons...
example.tran: 几乎没有什么事情能使牧师在准备每周的布道时分神。

example.ex: Behind any successful event lay months of preparation.
example.tran: 任何成功的活动都需要好几个月的准备。

gramarinfo.label: usu with supp, oft N <l>for/of</l> n

value.def: Preparations are all the arrangements that are made for a future event.

example.ex: The United States is making preparations for a large-scale airlift of 1,200 American citizens...
example.tran: 美国正在为运送1,200名美国公民的大规模空运做准备。

example.ex: Final preparations are under way for celebrations to mark German unification.
example.tran: 纪念德国统一的庆典活动正在做最后的准备工作。

value.tran: 准备工作；预备工作；筹备工作

value.def: A preparation is a mixture that has been prepared for use as food, medicine, or a cosmetic.

example.tran: 抗衰老面霜和敏感性皮肤适用的护肤制剂

value.tran: （食物、医药、化妆品的）制剂，配制品

rootsaffixes.indicate: 表名词，“行为，过程，状态，结果”
rootsaffixes.title: -ation

partsOfSpeech.dec: ap 加强 + prob 正直 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 认为正直 → 认可
combine 结合 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 结合，联合
determine 决定 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 决定
excite 使兴奋 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 兴奋
explain 解释，说明 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 解释，说明
imagine 想象 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 想象
invite 邀请 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 邀请；邀请书
prepare 准备 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 准备
preserve 保护 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 保护；贮藏
provoke 激怒 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 激怒
repute 名誉 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 名声
revoke 取消 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 取消；撤销
starve 使饿死 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 饥饿
